name: Pantomime
description: What is the project about? Pantomime is a mime token on the Ethereum chain. PantSwap is a full suite ecosystem consisting of DEX, Crypto Dashboards, Price Charts and more. What makes your project unique? Pantomime is the fastest DEX on the ethereum chain powered by the 0x API. It additionally comes with the CrypTick dashboard which is an easy to use interface for users to get a birds eye view on the crypto markets History of your project. Pantomime was announced in Nov'22 with an eye on increasing cryptocurrency adoption by providing useful tools for daily traders and novices alike. The PANTO token was officially launched in March'23 Whatâ€™s next for your project? In addition to the PantSwap DEX, Pantomime has developed the PantWallet which will provide a secure and fast wallet for users to safely store their cryptocurrency holdings. What can your token be used for? The Panto token is a governance token which is operated in a proof of stake model for users to stake their Panto as well as participate in Voting and governance decision making.
